page.title: 17ATTITUDES STRACATHRO
page.content: My name is Samir Ranjan. I am 9 years old and I live at Stracathro Hospital.My dad is a Senior House Officer. My sister and I go to Stracathro School. I used to live in India and there I went to Agie Mission school.I liked that school.We lived near Patna and had an uncle near Bombay. Then my dad wrote from England that we had to go from India just when my exams had started.In England we had many difficulties because my mum could not speak English but we got through. I have been in Durham, South Shields and now Stracathro. My mum thinks this is a quiet place. I like it here.
